inspect.description: Adds a pipeline with a labelled `IO.inspect`

inspect with color.body:
|> IO.inspect(
	label: "${0:$TM_FILEPATH:$TM_LINE_NUMBER}",
	syntax_colors: [number: :yellow, atom: :cyan, string: :green, boolean: :magenta, nil: :magenta]
)
inspect with color.description: Adds a pipeline with a labelled `IO.inspect` and colorizes data types

inspect with color limit infinity.body:
|> IO.inspect(
	label: "${0:$TM_FILEPATH:$TM_LINE_NUMBER}", 
	syntax_colors: [number: :yellow, atom: :cyan, string: :green, boolean: :magenta, nil: :magenta], 
	limit: :infinity
)
inspect with color limit infinity.description: Adds a pipeline with a labelled `IO.inspect`, colorizes data types, and displays everything

process info messages.body: IO.inspect(Process.info(self(), :messages), label: "${0:$TM_FILEPATH:$TM_LINE_NUMBER}", syntax_colors: [number: :yellow, atom: :cyan, string: :green, boolean: :magenta, nil: :magenta], limit: :infinity)
